alert.note: Alert for Santa Catalina and Rincon Mountains including Mount Lemmon, Summerhaven; Tucson Metro Area including Tucson, Green Valley, Marana, Vail; Upper San Pedro River Valley including Sierra Vista, Benson (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 10 at 6:05PM MST by NWS Tucson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Pima County through 645 PM MST... At 605 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Vail, or 14 miles southeast of Davis-Monthan Air Force Base, moving northwest at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 45 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... East Tucson, Davis-Monthan Air Force Base, Tanque Verde, Vail, Saguaro National Park East, Corona De Tucson and Rita Ranch. This includes the following highways... Interstate 10 between mile markers 269 and 292. Route 83 between mile markers 53 and 58. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
